    • Uses of Bullet in edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet

      Subclasses of Bullet in edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.game.bullet 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BarrierBullet
      Bullet that acts as a barrier around the player, buffering a few hits for the player
      class  Boss
      A Boss is an EnemyBullet usually with a special and complex pattern attached to it
      class  DarknessBullet
      Bullet that fades away from view when the player is focused
      class  EmbeddedBullet
      An EmbeddedBullet is an EnemyBullet that shoots out other bullets (in patterns, of course).
      class  EnemyBullet
      An EnemyBullet is a bullet that can be destroyed by the player using the player's bullets.
      class  LaserBullet 
      class  PlayerLaunchedBullet
      A Bullet shot by the player, which can deal damage to enemies.
      class  ShrinkingPlayerLaunchedBullet
      A bullet that shrinks as it moves
      class  SpellcardEmbeddedBullet
      Enemy(Bullet) with a Spellcard attached to it
